== Introduction ==
Kubuntu 7.04, the Feisty Fawn, as been released! Here we are defining the most critical bugs in Feisty.

=== Installation Issues ===
==== Appearance ====
* No issues at this time

==== Hardware ====
* No issues at this time

==== Applications ====
* No issues at this time

==== Languages & Accessibility ====
* The Kubuntu documentation is not shipped translated. This is due to a late translation cycle, however some of the docs have been translated and will be available when updates open.

==== Network ====
* No issues at this time

==== Internet ====
* No issues at this time

=== Upgrade Issues ===

==== Samba ====

* If you have Samba installed then you must uninstall it before upgrade to Feisty Fawn in order to not get error with dist-upgrade and then installation hangs in the middle of the configuration process <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/samba/+bug/102011/|Bug #102011]]</nowiki>
